com.schlimm.springcdi.decorator.strategies
Interface DelegateResolutionStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleDelegateResolutionStrategy
public interface DelegateResolutionStrategy

DelegateResolutionStrategy to implement resolution logic to find delegate for a given decorator.

nschlimm

Method Detail

getRegisteredDelegate

String getRegisteredDelegate(org.springframework.beans.factory.config.ConfigurableListableBeanFactory beanFactory,
                             DecoratorInfo decoratorInfo)
Search the delegate for the given DecoratorInfo.

Parameters:
beanFactory - bean factory that contains the delegate
decoratorInfo - decorator that holds the delegate field
Returns:
the name of the delegate bean
